posts.post_title: Feel free to make offers on what's left
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Andrew
Got to pay for my REA/Mastro wins.  :--)

Most cards have prices, anything that doesn't, feel free to make an offer.  I prefer to sell the 1961 Union Oil and 1952/53 Mother's Cookies as one lot each.  Many transactions on this board without a problem.  If you don't like the card, just return (less any Paypal/ship to fees.)  Much thanks.

No password required for the FOR SALE album.

[url]http://imageevent.com/littletreasures/forsale;jsessionid=9u5n65igb2.buffalo_s[/url]

email to opcyaz@hotmail.com or reply to this thread.

SOLD
1909 Obak Graney
1910 Obak Armbruster "150"
1910 Obak Fisher
1910 Obak Greggs
